sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; function App() { const [currentView, setCurrentView] = useState('dashboard'); const [scenarioDelay, setScenarioDelay] = useState(2); // REALISTIC project data with REAL reasoning const projectMetrics = { totalBudget: 75000000, spentToDate: 27800000, budgetRemaining: 47200000, totalDays: 245, daysElapsed: 118, daysRemaining: 127, overallCompletion: 58 }; const workPackages = [ { id: 1, name: 'Electrical Systems', completion: 45, risk: 'HIGH', budgetAllocated: 18000000, spent: 8100000, vendor: 'ABC Electrical', criticalPath: true, issueCount: 3, lastUpdate: '2 hours ago' }, { id: 2, name: 'Foundation & Structural', completion: 78, risk: 'LOW', budgetAllocated: 12000000, spent: 9360000, vendor: 'Steelworks Pro', criticalPath: false, issueCount: 0, lastUpdate: '1 day ago' }, { id: 3, name: 'HVAC Installation', completion: 52, risk: 'MEDIUM', budgetAllocated: 15000000, spent: 7800000, vendor: 'HVAC Solutions', criticalPath: true, issueCount: 1, lastUpdate: '4 hours ago' }, { id: 4, name: 'Fire Safety Systems', completion: 89, risk: 'LOW', budgetAllocated: 8000000, spent: 7120000, vendor: 'SafeGuard Fire', criticalPath: false, issueCount: 0, lastUpdate: '1 day ago' }, { id: 5, name: 'IT Infrastructure', completion: 34, risk: 'MEDIUM', budgetAllocated: 12000000, spent: 4080000, vendor: 'TechNet Systems', criticalPath: true, issueCount: 2, lastUpdate: '6 hours ago' }, { id: 6, name: 'Exterior Cladding', completion: 67, risk: 'LOW', budgetAllocated: 10000000, spent: 6700000, vendor: 'Steelworks Pro', criticalPath: false, issueCount: 0, lastUpdate: '3 hours ago' } ]; // REALISTIC electrical risk with ACTUAL cost breakdown const electricalRisk = { title: 'Electrical Systems - Critical Path Delay Risk', workPackageId: 1, riskLevel: 'HIGH', probability: 78, costImpactBreakdown: { laborOverrun: 1200000, // 3 weeks additional labor at $400K/week materialPremium: 450000, // Rush delivery premium on electrical components liquidatedDamages: 650000, // Contractual penalties to client for late delivery cascadingDelays: 0, // HVAC and IT teams waiting (included in labor) total: 2300000 }, scheduleImpact: { directDelay: 18, // Electrical work itself criticalPathExtension: 18, // Extends overall project completion description: 'Electrical is on critical path - any delay extends project completion' }, reasoning: 'ABC Electrical missed 3 consecutive milestones (switchgear delivery, main panel installation, circuit testing). Current burn rate indicates 78% probability of 3-week delay based on similar past projects.', mitigations: [ { title: 'Dual-source critical components', cost: 180000, timeToImplement: '5 days', riskReduction: 45, description: 'Secure backup suppliers for remaining switchgear and panels to reduce single-vendor dependency' }, { title: 'Accelerate penalty enforcement', cost: 0, timeToImplement: '2 days', riskReduction: 25, description: 'Trigger contractual penalties immediately to incentivize performance improvement' }, { title: 'Deploy backup electrical contractor', cost: 340000, timeToImplement: '14 days', riskReduction: 70, description: 'Bring in secondary qualified contractor to work parallel on non-interfering portions' } ] }; const getRiskColor = (level) => { switch (level) { case 'HIGH': return { bg: '#fef2f2', border: '#fca5a5', text: '#7f1d1d', dot: '#dc2626' }; case 'MEDIUM': return { bg: '#fffbeb', border: '#fcd34d', text: '#92400e', dot: '#f59e0b' }; case 'LOW': return { bg: '#f0fdf4', border: '#86efac', text: '#166534', dot: '#10b981' }; default: return { bg: '#f9fafb', border: '#d1d5db', text: '#374151', dot: '#6b7280' }; } }; const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return new Intl.NumberFormat('en-US', { style: 'currency', currency: 'USD', minimumFractionDigits: 0, maximumFractionDigits: 0 }).format(amount); }; const Dashboard = () => (
{/* PROJECT OVERVIEW - Top priority for PM */}
{/* Project Heatmap - MAIN FOCUS */}

Work Package Status

Last updated: 2 hours ago
{workPackages.map((pkg) => { const colors = getRiskColor(pkg.risk); return (
pkg.risk === 'HIGH' ? setCurrentView('risk-detail') : null} >

{pkg.name}

{pkg.vendor} • {formatCurrency(pkg.spent)} of {formatCurrency(pkg.budgetAllocated)}
{pkg.risk}
Progress {pkg.completion}%
{pkg.criticalPath ? '🔥 Critical Path' : 'Non-critical'} {pkg.issueCount} open issues
{pkg.risk === 'HIGH' && (
→ Click for detailed analysis
)}
); })}
{/* Executive Summary */}

Project Summary

Overall Progress
{projectMetrics.overallCompletion}%
Day {projectMetrics.daysElapsed} of {projectMetrics.totalDays}
Budget Status
{formatCurrency(projectMetrics.budgetRemaining)}
{formatCurrency(projectMetrics.spentToDate)} spent • {Math.round((projectMetrics.spentToDate/projectMetrics.totalBudget)*100)}% utilized
Schedule Status
{projectMetrics.daysRemaining} days
Until contractual completion
⚠️ Immediate Attention Required
Electrical package on critical path showing delivery risks. Potential {formatCurrency(electricalRisk.costImpactBreakdown.total)} impact if not addressed.
{/* CRITICAL RISKS - Second priority */}

Critical Risk Analysis

{electricalRisk.title}

{electricalRisk.probability}% probability • Critical path impact
COST IMPACT
{formatCurrency(electricalRisk.costImpactBreakdown.total)}
Labor overrun + Material premium + Liquidated damages
SCHEDULE IMPACT
+{electricalRisk.scheduleImpact.directDelay} days
Extends overall project completion
MITIGATION COST
{formatCurrency(180000)}
Dual-sourcing recommendation
Root Cause: {electricalRisk.reasoning}
{/* ACTION ITEMS */}
⏱️

Time Efficiency

Auto-analysis replaces 2.5 hours of manual status compilation and risk assessment

); const RiskDetail = () => (

Risk Analysis: {electricalRisk.title}

{/* COST IMPACT BREAKDOWN - Show the REAL math */}

Cost Impact Analysis: {formatCurrency(electricalRisk.costImpactBreakdown.total)}

Cost Breakdown

Extended Labor Costs {formatCurrency(electricalRisk.costImpactBreakdown.laborOverrun)}
3 weeks additional work @ $400K/week (crew of 12 electricians + supervision)
Material Rush Premium {formatCurrency(electricalRisk.costImpactBreakdown.materialPremium)}
Expedited delivery of switchgear and electrical panels (25% premium on $1.8M materials)
Liquidated Damages {formatCurrency(electricalRisk.costImpactBreakdown.liquidatedDamages)}
Contractual penalty to client for late delivery ($36K/day × 18 days)

Schedule Impact

Critical Path Extension: +{electricalRisk.scheduleImpact.directDelay} days
Electrical work gates HVAC rough-in and IT infrastructure installation. Any electrical delay directly extends project completion date.

Risk Probability

{electricalRisk.probability}% Probability Assessment
Based on: 3 consecutive missed milestones, current resource deployment rate, and historical performance data from 8 similar electrical packages.
{/* MITIGATION OPTIONS */}

Mitigation Strategies

{electricalRisk.mitigations.map((mitigation, idx) => (

{mitigation.title}

{mitigation.description}

-{mitigation.riskReduction}% risk
Investment: {mitigation.cost === 0 ? 'No cost' : formatCurrency(mitigation.cost)}
Implementation: {mitigation.timeToImplement}
))}
); const ScenarioPlanning = () => (

Scenario Impact Modeling

Electrical Package Delay Analysis

Model different delay scenarios to understand cost and schedule impacts

setScenarioDelay(parseInt(e.target.value))} style={{ width: '100%', height: '8px', borderRadius: '4px', background: `linear-gradient(to right, #3b82f6 0%, #3b82f6 ${(scenarioDelay/8)*100}%, #e5e7eb ${(scenarioDelay/8)*100}%, #e5e7eb 100%)`, outline: 'none', cursor: 'pointer' }} />
1 week 4 weeks 8 weeks

Current Baseline (2 weeks)

Cost Impact: {formatCurrency(electricalRisk.costImpactBreakdown.total)}
Schedule Impact: +{electricalRisk.scheduleImpact.directDelay} days
New Completion: Mar 15, 2025

Scenario Analysis ({scenarioDelay} weeks)

Cost Impact: {formatCurrency(electricalRisk.costImpactBreakdown.total * (scenarioDelay / 2))}
Schedule Impact: +{Math.round(electricalRisk.scheduleImpact.directDelay * (scenarioDelay / 2))} days
New Completion: Mar {15 + Math.round((scenarioDelay / 2) * 9)}, 2025
4 ? '#fef2f2' : '#eff6ff', borderRadius: '8px', border: `1px solid ${scenarioDelay > 4 ? '#fecaca' : '#bfdbfe'}` }}>
4 ? '#7f1d1d' : '#1e40af', marginBottom: '4px' }}> Impact Assessment:
4 ? '#991b1b' : '#1e3a8a' }}> {scenarioDelay > 4 ? 'CRITICAL - Would trigger executive escalation, client penalty discussions, and potential contract renegotiation' : scenarioDelay > 2 ? 'SIGNIFICANT - Requires immediate mitigation action and stakeholder notification' : 'MANAGEABLE - Within acceptable risk tolerance with current mitigation options' }
); return (
{/* Header */}

LATSO

Port Expansion Project - Phase 2 Control Center

Andrew Chen
Senior Project Manager
AC
{/* Main Content */}
{currentView === 'dashboard' && } {currentView === 'risk-detail' && } {currentView === 'scenario' && }
); } export default App;
